Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Family | Financial/Business | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 12, 2012
Episode Order: 3

Dead Good Job is a documentary series which takes a look at the changing face of the modern-day funeral and the work of undertakers as they deal with the living and the dead, from the mortuary to the grave.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32539)
